clinical_study.brief_title: Non Interventional Study on Pulmonary Valve Replacement by Thranscatheter Pulmonary Valve Melody™
clinical_study.official_title: Non Interventional Study on Pulmonary Valve Replacement by Thranscatheter Pulmonary Valve Melody™

brief_summary.textblock:
Prospective, longitudinal, open-label, multicentre, observational, non-comparative national study using an exhaustive registry of implantations over a given period.
This study is requested by French Health Authorities for reimbursement renewal, to maintain reimbursement for pulmonary valvular replacement by bioprothesis in approved indication in France.

primary_outcome.measure: absence of re-intervention on the pulmonary valve
primary_outcome.description: to evaluate the efficacy of the MELODY valve, defined as the absence of re-intervention on the pulmonary valvee

secondary_outcome.description: To document the rate re-intervention on the valve during a 60 months follow-up after its implantation

secondary_outcome.measure: time period before re-intervention on the valve
secondary_outcome.description: To document the time period before re-intervention on the valve (longevity of the prosthesis), the reasons for re-intervention (stent fracture, leak, stenosis) and the rate of durability (% of implanted valves with malfunction requiring a re-intervention)
To compare the patient characteristics to the indications of the bioprosthesis

secondary_outcome.measure: Description and time of onset of open surgery after implantation
secondary_outcome.description: Description and time of onset of open surgery after implantation on first implanted patients versus device replacement
To document the failures of the implantation procedure
To document the survival rate at 12, 36, 48 and 60 months

secondary_outcome.measure: frequency of antiplatelet treatment during and after implant
secondary_outcome.description: To describe the frequency of antiplatelet treatment during and after implant

secondary_outcome.measure: patients' characteristics to indications of the MELODY™ bioprosthesis
secondary_outcome.description: To compare patients' characteristics to indications of the MELODY™ bioprosthesis

secondary_outcome.measure: time period before the resumption of professional, university or scholastic activity
secondary_outcome.description: To document the time period before the resumption of professional, university or scholastic activity

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients implanted with Medtronic Melody valve

intervention.arm_group_label: Patients implanted with Medtronic Melody valve

study_pop.textblock: all patients receiving a valve implantation, without exception (exhaustive population)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients requiring pulmonary valvular replacement for correction of right ventricular ejection path malfunction (stenosis and/or pulmonary regurgitation).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient or legal representative refusal to data collection or processing
- Patient unable to guarantee follow-up data collection, in particular for patients living abroad
